results.title: Missed Bin Collections | Waverley Borough Council
results.snippet: You can check the status of your bin collections and report missed collections online. You will need to put in your address first.

results.title: Reporting a Missed Bin | Waverley Borough Council
results.snippet: Jan 10, 2025 ... Missed bin in Waverley Borough? Report it within 3 working days via the Council's online form to help us help you.

selected_links.reasoning: The title, URL, and snippet clearly indicate that this is a page dedicated to missed bin collections. The user can check the status of their collection and report misses.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.reasoning: The content does mention missed bin collections but does not provide specific steps or contact details for reporting a missed collection, hence partial answer. Confidence level is set at 50% because there might be additional information available on the website or through other channels.
Reason.next_actions: I would search for specific contact details within the council's website or call the customer service desk to report the missed bin collection.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content provides a summary of changes made to the webpage, but it does not fully address the primary question as a Council Resident wanting to know what to do in case of a missed bin collection. Key gaps or areas for improvement include providing clear steps and contact details for reporting missed collections.
